byline.contributor: Christopher Clarey reported from Rio de Janeiro.
byline.original: By BEN ROTHENBERG and CHRISTOPHER CLAREY

abstract: Argentine tennis player Juan Martin del Potro, who upset world's top-ranked player Novak Djokavic on his way to Olympic silver medal, is awarded wild card spot at United States Open.

headline.print_headline: Tennis; Ex-Champion del Potro Gets Wild Card for U.S. Open
headline.main: Argentina’s Juan Martín del Potro Receives Wild Card Into U.S. Open

snippet: Del Potro, who is ranked No. 141 in the world, won a silver medal at the Rio de Janeiro Olympics. But his inclusion in the field has stirred up some controversy....
lead_paragraph: Del Potro, who is ranked No. 141 in the world, won a silver medal at the Rio de Janeiro Olympics. But his inclusion in the field has stirred up some controversy.
